titles.title: Safe Playgrounds Act
To provide for grants to States for enacting statewide laws regulating public playgrounds consistent with playground safety guidelines established by the Consumer Product Safety Commission.
Safe Playgrounds Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

bill.summary: Safe Playgrounds Act - Directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) to provide grants to any State that has enacted a statewide law regulating public playgrounds consistent with guidelines in the CPSC Handbook for Public Playground Safety, or any other similar CPSC guidelines.
